text: 4. Find IP4 and IP6? // It find the address ip4 or ip6 import java.net.*; public class IPTest { public static void main (String[] args) { try { InetAddress ia = InetAddress.getByName (args[0]) ; byte[]l address = ia.getAddress() ; if (address.length == 1) System.out.println("IP4 Address'"); else if (address.length == 10) System.out.println("IP6 Address'"); } catch (Exception ex) { System.out.println(" Can't find the IP "); } } }
